price: 155. (Saleh) les dijo: «Aquí tenéis esta camella (como prueba de mi veracidad). Ella tiene un día asignado para beber y vosotros, otro.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla hādhihi nāqatun lahā shir'bun walakum shir'bu yawmin maʿlūmin
